line_1: When my lambkins were bleatin on meadow an brae,
line_2: As I went to my love in new cleeding sae gay,

line_1: And roars frae bank to brae;
Amang the brachens, on the brae,
line_2: The Deil, or else an outler Quey,

line_1: She's climbing up the Browny's brae,
line_2: O now I see her on the way,
